resources.string: Enter a name for the new track
This app works better if you have "Device Only" (GPS, no network) selected in your location preferences.\n You also need to allow mock locations in the "Developer options".

To use a GPX file, you can either :
 - Place it in the gpsplayer directory on the sdcard (path shown below)
 - Use "Open With" or "Share" on a GPX file from another app (Google Drive, Dropbox)
 
 The file will then appear on the list below.
